TRIGGERED_ABILITY.TRIGGER: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:SetZone( ZONE_GRAVEYARD ) filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) filter:SetController( EffectController() ) filter:NotTargetted() local total = filter:Count() if total > 3 then return ( EffectController():MyTurn() ~= 0 ) and ( MTG():GetStep() == STEP_UPKEEP ) else return false end
TRIGGERED_ABILITY.TARGET_DEFINITION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:May() filter:SetPlayer( EffectController() ) filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_GRAVEYARD ) filter:SetHint( HINT_ALLIED, EffectController() )
TRIGGERED_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:SetZone( ZONE_GRAVEYARD ) filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) filter:SetController( EffectController() ) filter:NotTargetted() local total = filter:Count() if EffectDC() ~= nil then local target = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_CardPtr(0) if (target ~= nil and total > 3) then target:GuidedReveal( ZONE_GRAVEYARD , ZONE_HAND ) target:PutInHand() end end
